DOC.brief_summary: All patient instruct eat therapeutic lifestyle diet receive CP-690,550 throughout 12 week study . After 6 week , half receive cholesterol lower agent , atorvastatin , half matching placebo . This study first measure effect CP-690,550 cholesterol level effect add atorvastatin level .
DOC.brief_title: Study Of The Effects Of Atorvastatin On Cholesterol Levels In Rheumatoid Arthritis Patients Taking CP-690,550
DOC.criteria: must diagnose active rheumatoid arthritis agree participate study sign inform consent document History serious infection within past 6 month test positive TB uncontrolled clinically significant disease laboratory test require administration prohibit medication study
